headline: Bernstein upgrades Air Products stock to ‘outperform’ on leadership shift
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein upgraded Air Products and Chemicals Inc (NYSE:APD) to "Outperform" and raised its price target to $375 from $290 given an improved strategic direction under new leadership following investor-backed board changes.

content.title: Bernstein upgrades Air Products stock to ‘outperform’ on leadership shift
content.summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein upgraded Air Products and Chemicals Inc (NYSE:APD) to "Outperform" and raised its price target to $375 from $290 given an improved strategic direction under new leadership following investor-backed board changes.
